abilities.name: lightslinger
abilities.description: Whenever Lucian uses an ability, his next attack becomes a double-shot.

abilities.name: piercing light
abilities.description: Lucian shoots a bolt of piercing light through a target.

abilities.name: ardent blaze
abilities.description: Lucian shoots a missile that explodes in a star shape, marking and briefly revealing enemies. Lucian gains Movement Speed for attacking marked enemies.

abilities.name: relentless pursuit
abilities.description: Lucian quickly dashes a short distance. Lightslinger attacks reduce Relentless Pursuit's cooldown.

abilities.name: the culling
abilities.description: Lucian unleashes a torrent of shots from his weapons.
